items.content_html: A lightweight, multi-tier online bookstore with Node.js RESTful microservices for catalog and order handling, supported by a MySQL database. Features search by topic, book info retrieval, and purchasing capabilities, with distributed deployment and concurrent request management across separate services.
items.title: masaabuaisheh/A-Multi-tier-Online-Book-Store: A lightweight, multi-tier online bookstore with Node.js RESTful microservices for catalog and order handling, supported by a MySQL database. Features search by topic, book info retrieval, and purchasing capabilities, with distributed deployment and concurrent request management across separate services.

items.content_html: Join is a lightweight and flexible Kanban board application designed to help teams and individuals manage tasks and projects efficiently. Inspired by Trello, Join enables you to create boards, lists, and cards to organize your workflow seamlessly.
